# Product Designer

## Column

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(paletteer)
library(kableExtra)

resume_a <- read_csv("Product_Designer_Resume_09.2024.csv")
middle_a <- read_csv("Product_Designer_Vacancy_Middle_09.2024.csv")
senior_a <- read_csv("Product_Designer_Vacancy_Senior_09.2024.csv")

```

```{r}
resume_a1 <- resume_a |> 
  select("Middle", "Senior")

resume_a1 <- gather(resume_a1)

p1 <- ggplot(resume_a1, mapping = aes(key, value, color = key)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, face="bold")) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(size=0.5, position=position_jitter(0.3)) +
  facet_grid() +
  scale_color_paletteer_d("PrettyCols::Bold") +
  ggtitle('Резюме') +
  labs(x = " ") +
  labs(y = " ") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, face="bold")) +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="white"))

ggplotly(p1)

```

### Row {.tabset}

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| title: Статистика
resume_a2 <- drop_na(resume_a, Middle, Senior)
knitr::kable(head(summary(resume_a2[2:3]))) %>%
    column_spec(2, color = "#6396b0") %>%
    column_spec(3, color = "#6a359c") %>%
    row_spec(5, bold = TRUE, color = "#000000")
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| title: Количество данных
a2 <- colSums(!is.na(resume_a[2]))
a3 <- colSums(!is.na(resume_a[3]))
a5 <- sum(resume_a$Офис, na.rm = T)
a6 <- sum(resume_a$Удалённо, na.rm = T)
a7 <- sum(resume_a$Гибрид, na.rm = T)

a <- tibble("Middle" = a2, "Senior" = a3, "Офис" = a5, "Удалённо" = a6, "Гибрид" = a7)

knitr::kable(a)
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| title: Данные
knitr::kable(resume_a) |>
    kableExtra::scroll_box(height = "350px")
```

## Column

```{r}

m1 <- gather(middle_a[ ,1])
s1 <- gather(senior_a[ ,1])

m1$key <- paste0("Middle")
s1$key <- paste0("Senior")

q2 <- rbind2(m1, s1, by="key", all.x=T, sort=F)

p <- ggplot(q2, mapping = aes(key, value, color = key)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(size=0.5, position=position_jitter(0.3)) +
  facet_grid() +
  scale_color_paletteer_d("PrettyCols::Bold") +
  ggtitle('Вакансии')+
  labs(x = " ") +
  labs(y = " ") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, face="bold")) +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="white"))

ggplotly(p)

```

knitr::kable(vac) %>%
